title: Installation issue: font-util
body:
<!-- Thanks for taking the time to report this build failure. To proceed with the report please:

1. Title the issue "Installation issue: <name-of-the-package>".
2. Provide the information required below.

We encourage you to try, as much as possible, to reduce your problem to the minimal example that still reproduces the issue. That would help us a lot in fixing it quickly and effectively! -->

Spack won't install font-util on OpenSUSE Leap 15.1.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install font-util
...
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    './configure' '--prefix=/home/andrew/sta-toolchain/spack/opt/spack/linux-opensuse_leap15-haswell/gcc-8.4.0/font-util-1.3.2-il3ccyhky3pktjxtbo2onjs3lnqix5oi'

1 error found in build log:
     389    checking for mkfontdir... /home/andrew/sta-toolchain/spack/opt/spack/linux-opensuse_leap15-haswell/gcc-8.4.0/mkfontdir-1.0.7-34ayolrx62sbeh4oh3wi7txxqhf7hjnd/bin/mkfontdir
     390    checking for bdftopcf... /home/andrew/sta-toolchain/spack/opt/spack/linux-opensuse_leap15-haswell/gcc-8.4.0/bdftopcf-1.0.5-5zbnh3nwfsvi5nb23o4xhilbcavglvg7/bin/bdftopcf
     391    checking font compression method... gzip
     392    checking for gzip... /usr/bin/gzip
     393    checking for ucs2any... /home/andrew/sta-toolchain/spack/opt/spack/linux-opensuse_leap15-haswell/gcc-8.4.0/font-util-1.3.2-il3ccyhky3pktjxtbo2onjs3lnqix5oi/bin/ucs2any
     394    checking for MAPS... no
  >> 395    configure: error: Package requirements (fontutil) were not met:
     396    
     397    Package 'fontutil', required by 'virtual:world', not found
     398    
     399    Consider adjusting the PKG_CONFIG_PATH environment variable if you
     400    installed software in a non-standard prefix.
```
